hotels.title: Five-Star Adults-Only Fiji Beachside Retreat on Tokoriki Island
hotels.description: Laidback luxury on Fiji’s phenomenal sands awaits with an escape to the adults-only, five-star Tokoriki Island Resort. This award-winning resort offers just 36 traditional bures and villas surrounded by lush greenery, and each one offers a taste of secluded serenity while perfectly fusing modern Fijian-inspired design elements. Savour Fijian fine dining and watch swaying palm trees move with the salty sea breeze, rejuvenate and revitalise with a visit to the world-class Tokoriki Spa or take it easy and watch the day drift slowly by with a cocktail in hand. Whatever you decide, you'll be supported by Tokoriki Island Resort's traditional Fijian hospitality and top-notch attention to detail.
